Description: Worked flint flake, roughly rectangular in shape, maybe a borer. Broken proximal end, abrupt retouch along the upper dorsal left and right laterals, forming a point at the distal end. Yellowish-orange and red coloured stone, fine-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
